title: Morgana's Dark Binding should CC for longer!
body: Morgana's Q should CC for 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 seconds. She has way too much counterplay.

replies.body:
Ah yes, way too much counterplay. That's why she's banned every second game, right?

She LITERALLY has a fuck-you shield that negates EVERY CC.

No way in hell should her Binding be buffed in ANY way.
